host.description: Host domain of the snowflake instance (must include the account, region, cloud environment, and end with snowflakecomputing.com).

authenticator.description: Specifies the authenticator to use for verifying user login credentials, optional parameter

role.description: The role you created for Airbyte to access Snowflake.

warehouse.description: The warehouse you created for Airbyte to sync data into.

database.description: The database you created for Airbyte to sync data into.

schema.description: The Snowflake schema you created for Airbyte to sync data into.

username.description: The username you created to allow Airbyte to access the database.

basic_normalization.description: Whether or not to normalize the data in the destination. See basic normalization for more details.
basic_normalization.title: Basic Normalization
